modmenu.descriptionTranslation.artifalit: Collection of useful artifacts, blocks, enchantments and more.
block.artifality.artifact_upgrader.descr:
Allows you to &fupgrade your artifact&7,
fill with &f3 Incremental Blocks &7to
upgrade to &ftier 2&7, or with
&fNether Star &7for &ftier 3&7.
block.artifality.crystal_heart_lens.desc:
&fGives additional 10 hearts &7to players
in radius of beacon if placed
on top of the beacon.
block.artifality.incremental_lens.descri:
&fIncreases the level of effect&7
given by the beacon if placed
on top of the beacon.
block.artifality.lunar_crystal_lens.desc:
Gives &fglowing effect &7to players
in radius of beacon if placed
on top of the beacon.
enchantment.artifality.sliding_curse.des:
Makes you &fslide on all
blocks &7like on ice.
item.artifality.balloon.description:
When in hand &fincreases jump
height &7and while sneaking
&fgives slow falling effect&7.
item.artifality.forest_staff.description:
Allows you to easily &fplant a
saplings &7and &ffertilize it&7,
takes the necessary items from
the player's inventory, and
also &frewards with experience&7.
item.artifality.invisibility_cape.descri:
&fMakes the wearer invisible
&7while sneaking, also
&fhides the worn armor&7.
item.artifality.ukulele.description:
When used, creates a cloud with
a &frandom positive effect &7under the
player, and if equipped on the
back, creates a cloud with a &frandom
negative effect &7under the attacker.
Cooldown: 20 sec
item.artifality.zeus_staff.description:
Summons lightning at the target point,
also neutralizes lightning damage
while in the main hand.
misc.artifality.wiki: <Check Out the Wiki for More Info>
